Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Magical Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Bloodline Resistance: +1 vs. spells and magical effects
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x Hit Points and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. ongoing disease or poison reduces stage by 2 (1 if virulent; 3 or 2 with critical success)
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Magic
Spell Slots: A0: 5; A10: 2; A1: 5; A2: 5; A3: 5; A4: 5; A5: 5; A6: 5; A7: 5; A8: 5; A9: 5; D0: 5; D10: 2; D1: 4; D2: 4; D3: 4; D4: 4; D5: 4; D6: 4; D7: 4; D8: 4; D9: 5; O0: 5; O10: 2; O1: 5; O2: 5; O3: 5; O4: 5; O5: 5; O6: 5; O7: 5; O8: 5; O9: 5; P0: 5; P10: 2; P1: 4; P2: 4; P3: 4; P4: 4; P5: 4; P6: 4; P7: 4; P8: 4; P9: 5 Focus Points: 3 Attack: Arcane: 32; Divine: 32; Occult: 33; Primal: 32 Spell DC: Arcane: 40; Divine: 40; Occult: 41; Primal: 40
Magic Notes:
Aberrant: Spell Trained (Occult)
Advanced Bloodline: Knows advanced bloodline spell/+1 Focus Points
Angelic: Spell Trained (Divine)
Bloodline Paragon: Has 1 10th-level spell slot
Bloodline Perfection: +1 10th level spell slot
Bloodline: Has a Focus Pool with 1 Focus Point
Demonic: Spell Trained (Divine)
Diabolic: Spell Trained (Divine)
Divine Evolution: +1 D9 slot for a heal or harm spell
Draconic: Spell Trained (Arcane))
Elemental: Spell Trained (Primal)
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Occult; Divine; Arcane; Primal)
Fey: Spell Trained (Primal)
Greater Bloodline: Knows greater bloodline spell/+1 Focus Points
Greater Mental Evolution: +1 spell slot of each level
Hag: Spell Trained (Occult)
Imperial: Spell Trained (Arcane)
Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Occult; Divine; Arcane; Primal)
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Occult; Divine; Arcane; Primal)
Primal Evolution: +1 P9 slot for a Summon Animal or a Summon Plant Or Fungus spell
Undead: Spell Trained (Divine)
Aberrant: Casting a bloodline spell gives self or target +2 Will saves for 1 rd
Aberrant: Knows Tentacular Limbs spell
Adaptive Adept: Knows a cantrip or level 1 spell from a different tradition
Angelic: Casting a bloodline spell gives self or target +1 saves for 1 rd
Angelic: Knows Angelic Halo spell
Arcane Evolution: May learn 1 additional spell from spellbook each dy, treating it as a signature spell if it is in repertoire
Bespell Weapon: Casting a spell causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d6 HP until end of turn; damage type depends on spell school
Bloodline Conduit: May cast instantaneous spells of 5th level and lower without expending a spell slot
Bloodline Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Bloodline Wellspring: Refocus restores 3 Focus Points
Cantrip Expansion: May prepare two additional cantrips each dy
Counterspell: May expend a spell slot to counteract a known spell
Crossblooded Evolution: May know 1 spell from a different tradition
Dangerous Sorcery: Instantaneous spells inflict additional damage equal to their levels
Demonic: Casting a bloodline spell gives self +1 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts -1 AC on target for 1 rd
Demonic: Knows Glutton's Jaws spell
Diabolic: Casting a bloodline spell gives self +1 Deception for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP fire per spell level on target for 1 rd
Diabolic: Knows Diabolic Edict spell
Draconic: Casting a bloodline spell gives self or target +1 AC for 1 rd
Draconic: Knows Dragon Claws spell
Effortless Concentration: May freely extend the duration of 1 spell
Elemental: Casting a bloodline spell gives self +1 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP bludgeoning or fire per spell level on target for 1 rd
Elemental: Knows Elemental Toss spell
Fey: Casting a bloodline spell gives self or target concealment for 1 rd
Fey: Knows Faerie Dust spell
Greater Crossblooded Evolution: May know 3 spells of different levels from different traditions
Hag: Casting a bloodline spell inflicts 2 HP mental per spell level to first successful attacker for 1 rd
Hag: Knows Jealous Hex spell
Imperial: Casting a bloodline spell gives self or target +1 skill checks for 1 rd
Imperial: Knows Ancestral Memories spell
Interweave Spell: May expend a spell slot to add Dispel Magic effects to a successful single-target spell
Magic Sense: Has continuous Detect Magic effects
Metamagic Mastery: May freely use metamatic single actions
Occult Evolution: May learn 1 unknown mental spell each dy
Overwhelming Energy: May have spells ignore resistance 20 to choice of energy
Quickened Casting: Reduces the time required to cast a spell of level 8 or lower by 1 action
Reach Spell: May extend spell range by 30'
Reflect Spell: May have a successful Counterspell on a targeted spell inflict the spell effects on the caster
Signature Spells: May freely heighten a chosen spell of each level
Sorcerer Spellcasting: May learn spells from the Occult; Divine; Arcane; Primal tradition
Steady Spellcasting: A successful DC 15 flat check negates self spellcasting disruption
Undead: Casting a bloodline spell gives self 1 temporary HP per spell level for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP negative per spell level on target for 1 rd
Undead: Knows Undeath's Blessing spell
Widen Spell: May increase the effect of 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
Notes
Validation Errors:
Adaptive Adept Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 5 and adapted cantrip feature
Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 31 allocated
Interweave Spell Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 14 and dispel magic spell
